channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Your Complete Guide To The Dramatic Solar Eclipse This Weekend
item.description: The best places and times to see the Sept. 21/22, 2025, partial solar eclipse from New Zealand, Antarctica and the South Pacific.

item.title: Can Coffee Be A Force For Good?
item.description: Coffee prices are rising due to a changing climate but consumers can support companies that take action to secure sustainable coffee farms and forests...

item.title: Franklin Templeton Bets Blockchain Will Transform Asset Management
item.description: Franklin Templeton is using blockchain to transform money funds and capital markets, with tokenization poised to upend finance as stablecoins scale.

item.title: Do Not Use Google Chrome On Your PC, Microsoft Warns
item.description: Microsoft issues new attack on Google Chrome — what to know.

item.title: NSA Warns iPhone And Android Users—Close All Apps If You See This
item.description: If you see this on your smartphone, it's an attack.

item.title: Before we learn a new skill
item.description: The pre-work involves important choices: Skip these steps and you might as well not bother to begin.

item.title: New post
item.description: There’s a button in WordPress that initiates a new post. And another that publishes it. That’s a clear and practical metaphor for what we do, all day,...

item.title: Often give in

item.title: Kinds of reckless
item.description: Worth noting that there’s no ‘w’ in reckless. We imagine there might be, since a wreck is entirely possible. There’s the recklessness of creative gene...

item.title: No time?
item.description: It’s easy to announce that we don’t have time for a new skill or a generous act. But the truth is we probably could find the time. What we don’t have ...
